channel.title: Corrupted file, what's this error?
channel.description:
I saved this file this afternoon and shut down the axoloti editor without any problems. But somehow I can't read open the patch now and I just don't see what is the problem. When opening the file in notepad, it looks like nothing of the code is missing..
javax.xml.stream.XMLStreamException: ParseError at [row,col]:[336,37] Message: The entity name must immediately follow the '&' in the entity reference. javax.xml.stream.XMLStreamException: ParseError item.title: Corrupted file, what's this error?
item.dc:creator: @SirSickSik Remco
item.description:
@SirSickSik wrote:

ah, found the problem. Was pretty lucky as I started just copying the codes of the patch in new module-objects and the object I started with was actually the module creating the problem!
Seems the whole problem was that I used this expression "array[cnt%step[0]]", where "]]" created the error. After I editted the file to write it like this: "array[(cnt%step[0])]" , the patch worked again pfieuw!

Read full topic
